products.name: Delna Submersible Pumps
products.description: Experience unmatched efficiency and durability with Delna's Submersible Pumps, designed for superior water lifting performance and long-lasting reliability.

products.name: Delna LED Panel Lights
products.description: High-performance, energy-efficient LED panel lights delivering industry-leading 110 lumens per watt illumination.
features: Built with thick heat sync aluminum sheets

products.description: High-performance, energy-efficient LED panel lights delivering industry-leading 110 lumens per watt illumination.

products.name: Delna HMS Conduit Pipes
products.description: Heavy Mechanical Strength (HMS) conduit pipes designed for high-impact and industrial applications where cables need maximum protection.

products.name: Delna Wall Lights
products.description: Elegant and energy-efficient wall lights for modern and stylish interiors.

products.name: Delna LMS Pipes
products.description: LMS pipes are suitable for low-impact applications where minimal mechanical stress is expected. They are ideal for residential wiring and indoor installations, offering easy handling and smooth wire pulling.
features: Smooth interior for easy wire pulling

products.name: Delna MMS Pipes
products.description: MMS pipes provide a balance between flexibility and durability, making them suitable for commercial buildings and medium-duty applications. They offer better impact resistance than LMS pipes while maintaining ease of installation.

products.name: Delna HMS Conduit Pipes
products.description: HMS pipes are designed for high-impact and industrial applications where cables need maximum protection. These pipes are highly durable, resistant to harsh environments, and suitable for underground and outdoor installations.

products.name: Delna Concealed Lights
products.description: Efficient and stylish concealed lighting solutions for modern interiors.
features: Built with thick heat sync aluminum sheets for enhanced heat dissipation
High & low watt protection for longer lifespan

products.name: Delna Surface Lights
products.description: High-performance surface-mounted LED lights for modern applications.
features: Sturdy aluminum construction for better heat management

products.name: Delna COB Lights
products.description: COB LED lights with superior focus and efficiency.
features: Features a long aluminum reflector for better light focus

products.name: Delna Linear Lights
products.description: Slim and efficient linear LED lights with long focus range.

products.name: Delna Foot Lights
products.description: Elegant LED foot lights for soft illumination.

products.name: Delna ZHFR Electrical Wires
products.description: Zero Halogen Flame Retardant (ZHFR) wires with superior conductivity and safety features.

products.name: Delna Double PVC Wires
products.description: High-quality copper conductor with optimal gauge for efficiency and double-layered PVC insulation for enhanced safety and durability.
features: Better resistance to heat, moisture, and environmental factors
Meter marking for accurate installation measurements
certifications: Twisted conductor design for better flexibility and durability
High-performance insulation for fire safety and longevity
